ygData.subject: Being Charmed
ygData.msgSnippet: I am only a level 18 cleric and have been fighting the crows in West Karana and I am not familiar being charmed as of yet and I guess I am thankful I have not
ygData.messageBody:
I am only a level 18 cleric and have been fighting the crows in West Karana
and I am not familiar being charmed as of yet and I guess I am thankful I
have not been charmed but my question is? Is charm an area affect? Does the
evil eye, or whatever cast it on all the party members at once or one at a
time? If one at a time, is it possible to remove some of the spells in your
slot before the charm effect hits you?
Also, as I am advancing toward level 20, I will only be able to take the
crows for two more levels and will have to move on. I have read many
messages of places to go, many do not like Befallen or Unrest, so are there
any suggestions of other possible places? Many times I find I am solo,
especially during the week.Has anyone done the skeletons etc, at the ruins
in West Karana and could I possibly solo there?Healingsun, Solusek Ro
